mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TRIPLIST_DETAIL WHERE MYTRIPCODE=#{code} AND CONTENTID=#{contentid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MYTRIP(CODE, TITLE, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, THEMA) VALUES (#{code}, #{title}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{thema})
mapper.update: UPDATE MYTRIP SET NUM=NUM+1 WHERE CODE=#{value}
mapper.select: SELECT A.CODE AS CODE, B.USERID AS USERID, A.TITLE AS TITLE, A.COVERIMG AS COVERIMG, A.STARTDATE AS STARTDATE, A.ENDDATE AS ENDDATE, A.THEMA AS THEMA, A.NUM AS NUM FROM MYTRIP A, TRIPGROUP B WHERE A.CODE=B.CODE AND B.USERID=#{value}
SELECT * FROM TRIPLIST_DETAIL WHERE MYTRIPCODE=#{value} ORDER BY TRIPDATE, IDX
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TRIPLISTBBS (IDX, TRIPCODE, TRIPNUM, TRIPDATE, USERID, USERNICNAME, USERPROFILE, MEMO, GRP, REPORTING_DATE) VALUES (TRIPLISTBBS_IDX_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{tripcode}, #{tripnum}, #{tripdate}, #{userid}, #{usernicname}, #{userprofile}, #{memo}, #{grp}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TRIPLISTBBS WHERE TRIPCODE=#{tripcode} ORDER BY GRP, SEQ
mapper.update: UPDATE TRIPLISTBBS SET SEQ=#{seq1} WHERE GRP=#{grp} AND SEQ > #{seq2}
